name: Day at the Bleach
description:
To find out ways you can help our coral reef, visit The Nature Conservancy!

Created for ARTG/CMPM120. SPRING 2017.

TEAM ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Kevin Wu | Kimberley Keomanee | Paul Odion | Seth Crawford

A Day at the Bleach is a 2D endless runner based on the bleaching and inevitable death of the Great Barrier Reef. *If your game pauses, just click on the white area to the left/right of the game canvas to resume! Size Problems? If the game is too big/small, resize the screen with CTRL -/+! (CMD -/+ if you're on a Mac!)
